name: American Psycho DS Editon
description:
American Psycho Written by Bret Easton Ellis

Movie by Lions Gate Films

Idea by redshibe

Description (by redshibe)

American Psycho is a Nintendo DS game from 2007, developed by THQ and published by Lionsgate Films. The game was planned as a movie tie-in with "American Psycho 3: The Grinch Returns" but never properly released to the public, following the cancellation of the movie's production. However, the game eventually ended up on grocery store shelves, alongside other all-time classics like milk, bread, and mustard.

A = Space

D PAD = Arrows

X = B

LR = Z

This game was rushed, being made in about 10 hours total.
